byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and RACHEL DONADIO
byline.contributor: Steven Erlanger reported from Paris, and Rachel Donadio from Athens. Stephen Castle contributed reporting from Brussels, and Elisabetta Povoledo from Rome.

abstract: New fissures and disagreements emerge on the eve of a European Union summit meeting promoted as the moment for agreement on a comprehensive solution to the two-year-old euro crisis.
snippet: On the eve of a European Union summit meeting, crucial financial measures were still unresolved.
lead_paragraph: On the eve of a European Union summit meeting, crucial financial measures were still unresolved.

headline.main: Europe Faces New Hurdles in Crisis Over Debt
headline.print_headline: New Hurdles For Europe In Crisis Over Debt
headline.seo: Europe Faces New Hurdles in Debt Crisis
